mapper.insert: insert into bookmark (bookmark_idx, member_idx, board_idx, boardBookmarked) values ((select nvl(max(bookmark_idx), 100000) + 1 from (select bookmark_idx from bookmark) as temp), #{member_idx}, #{board_idx}, #{boardBookmarked})
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where member_idx = #{member_idx} and board_idx = #{board_idx}
mapper.select: select * from bookmark where member_idx = #{member_idx} and board_idx = #{board_idx}
